content.html: I had an abortion this year and it hurts my soul the fact that we still debating this shit as a society. The rhetoric on all sides demonstrates how far we are from a society full of love and community. link.medium.com/AXak18IyPpb

I had an abortion this year and it hurts my soul the fact that we still debating this shit as a society. 

The rhetoric on all sides demonstrates how far we are from a society full of love and community.
